title: Simon Cowell dig at Lewis Hamilton as Nicole Scherzinger flirts on X Factor
text:
Simon Cowell makes dig at Nicole Scherzinger’s exes as she flirts with Ben Foden tonight (Picture: Getty)

Simon Cowell wasted no time rinsing Nicole Scherzinger over her past relationship with Lewis Hamilton during tonight’s X Factor: Celebrity as she started sweating over rugby ace Ben Foden.

Tonight sees the likes of Martin Bashir and the cast of Love Island battle it out for a huge record deal with Syco. And one of the biggest surprises from the first part of two Judges’ Houses comes from Try Star, made up of rugby internationals Ben Foden, Thom Evans and Levi Davis.

But no one is more excited to see the three heartthrobs – torsos out with their unbuttoned shirts – than Nicole.

‘Hello, who do we have here?’ the Pussycat Doll purred.

‘I’m really excited about this,’ Simon grinned, but that was nothing on his co-judge.

‘Me too, I’m also excited about this shirt right now. How it just hangs, freely and openly… and your chesticles,’ she gasped.

Ben, Thom Evans and Levi Davis make up Try Star (Picture: ITV)

Ben remarried earlier this year (Picture: ITV)

But after the singer’s on-off romance with Lewis Hamilton and relationship with tennis hero Grigor Dimitrov, Simon jumped in: ’Not another sport’s star…’

Regardless, Ben is a happily married man since tying the knot with Jackie Belanoff Smith after two weeks of dating.

The 34-year-old was previously married to the Saturdays singer Una Healy before he cheated with PR worker Becky Milne in 2018. Although, he’s still hoping his pop star ex-wife comes down to support him in the live shows.

‘My kids, I’d love to get them down to the show. Err, I’ll ask Una whether she’ll come or not, and then we’ll see,’ he told Metro.co.uk.

‘Obviously my wife will come as well and she’ll support me,’ he added.

X factor: Celebrity kicks off tonight at 8.25pm on ITV.
